channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Switchable value which can be described using two values - on and off.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Bit offset
parameter.description: Bit offset from beginning of data section (counted from 0).

parameter.name: onValue
parameter.label: On value
parameter.description: Value which indicates 'ON' state, described using bit template.

parameter.name: offValue
parameter.label: Off value
parameter.description: Value which indicates 'OFF' state, described using bit template.

channel-type.label: Contact
channel-type.description: Contact which can be described using two values - open and closed.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Bit offset
parameter.description: Bit offset from beginning of data section (counted from 0).

parameter.name: openValue
parameter.label: Open value
parameter.description: Value which indicates 'OPEN' state, described using bit template.

parameter.name: closedValue
parameter.label: Closed value
parameter.description: Value which indicates 'CLOSED' state, described using bit template.

channel-type.label: Number
channel-type.description: Numeric value interpreted according to typical binary encoding scheme.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Bit offset
parameter.description: Bit offset from beginning of data section (counted from 0).

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Bit length
parameter.description: Number of bits which should be read or written into message.

parameter.name: type
parameter.label: Type
parameter.description: Encoding of data and its endianness.

parameter.name: littleEndian
parameter.label: Little endian
parameter.description: Switch little endian encoding for written/received values. By default, all mappings are expected to be big endian.

channel-type.label: Byte sequence
channel-type.description: Raw sequence of data, with no processing values are communicated using RawType (byte sequence).

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Bit offset
parameter.description: Bit offset from beginning of data section (counted from 0).

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Bit length
parameter.description: Number of bits which should be read or written into message.
